info.p: N-Quads is a plain text serialization format for Resource Description Framework (RDF) datasets, extending the N-Triples format to support multiple RDF graphs. N-Quads is particularly useful for applications that require handling multiple RDF graphs, such as data integration tasks, provenance tracking, and managing complex datasets within the Semantic Web framework.
See: the W3C documentation for a detailed description; Wikipedia for an overview.
